img_summary: The image displays the equipment menu from a video game, focusing on the "Earth Wolf" spirit, categorized as Epic with a high Qi cost. The ability "Wild Rapture" allows the player to take the form of an Earth Wolf and charge at foes to make them stumble. The equipped effect grants a small amount of additional Focus on hit. The UI shows various spirits available for selection, and the player's stats are listed on the right, including health, attack, defense, and other attributes.
